title: Cantrip
content: 1 turn 18m Sorcerer, WarlockWizard, High Elf, High Half-Elf , Eldritch Knight Dancing Lights Evocation Action N/A Illuminate a 9m radius.10 Turns18m Concentration College of Lore, College of Valour, Sorcerer, Wizard, Eldritch Knight Eldritch Blast Evocation Action N/A 1~10 Damage1d10 Force Conjure 1 beam(s) of crackling energy. 18mAttack Roll Warlock Fire Bolt Evocation Action N/A 1~10 Damage1d10 Fire Hurl a mote of fire.18m WizardElf (High Elf)Half-Elf (High Half-Elf)Eldritch Knight (Fighter)S
